DOC.brief_summary: The investigators conducted a randomized controlled trial to describe if multidisciplinary and patient-centered transitional care interventions for patients with cirrhosis post-TIPS can improve compliance behavior and reduce complications post-TIPS after discharge.
DOC.brief_title: Transitional Care Interventions for Patients With Cirrhosis Post-TIPS
